nhc_headline: ...MILTON BRINGING DEVASTATING RAINS AND DAMAGING WINDS INLAND OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL FLORIDA...
summary:
...MILTON BRINGING DEVASTATING RAINS AND DAMAGING WINDS INLAND OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL FLORIDA...
 As of 11:00 PM EDT Wed Oct 9
 the center of Milton was located near 27.6, -82.0
 with movement ENE at 16 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 960 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 105 mph.
